translation.de: Ich weiß, sie sind noch da drin.

translation.en: Okay. What are their names?
Joanne and Peri Monroe.
And I'm... I'm Ray.
[officer 1] Okay.
-You're gonna help me? -[officer 1] All right.
Why don't we go inside and see if we can sort this out?
-Would you please? -[officer 1] Okay.
Come on.
[receptionist] Hey, it's the front desk.
Send somebody over here now. It's him.
translation.de: Schickt sofort jemanden her. Es ist er.

translation.en: Hey, we just dropped off that OD. [receptionist] Yes, what can I do for you?
translation.de: -Wir brachten die Überdosis rein. -Ja, was gibt es noch?

translation.en: Okay, so, now we have this man here
who says that you all are holding his family against their will.
translation.de: Sie halten seine Familie gegen ihren Willen fest.

translation.en: -You stay away from me. -[receptionist] That's ridiculous.
[Ray] That's the guy.
That's the one that put me in the room, and he held me against my will.
translation.de: Der hat mich eingesperrt und mich festgehalten.

translation.en: -[officer 1] You know this guy? -Yeah.
All right, well, he's saying that you roughed him up
-and that you injected him with drugs. -Yep.
No, he was in earlier and acting a fool, so the on-call doc gave him a sedative.
translation.de: Er benahm sich daneben. Der Arzt gab ihm Beruhigungsmittel.

translation.en: -That's what happened. -You're a liar.
I'm not lying. Why aren't you arresting his ass?
[officer 2] Calm down. Let us handle this.
Now, where did you last see your wife and daughter?
translation.de: Wo sahen Sie zuletzt Frau und Tochter?

translation.en: It was in the emergency ward, it was ward nine.
It was just through those doors.
I can't believe you guys are buying into this bullshit. I mean, he's a fuckin' head case! Look at him.
translation.de: Unfassbar, dass Sie den Mist glauben. Er ist irre! Schauen Sie ihn doch an.

translation.en: Want to take us to ward nine...
Jeff?
Today, please.
Now, your chest X-rays show a slight infiltration
translation.de: Ihr Röntgenbild zeigt eine leichte Infiltration

translation.en: in the right lower front lobe of your lungs--
Doctor.
Now do you want to tell me where my wife and daughter are?
translation.de: Sagen Sie, wo meine Frau und Tochter sind?

translation.en: -They should've locked you up! -We'll handle this.
He slipped out.
Can you answer this man's question?
He says that his wife and daughter are missing in the hospital.
translation.de: Frau und Tochter gingen im Krankenhaus verloren?

translation.en: The answer is, I don't know.
According to our nursing staff, Mr. Monroe came in alone,
translation.de: Laut Pflegepersonal kam Mr. Monroe allein, wegen seiner Kopfverletzung.

translation.en: -wishing to be seen for a head injury. -Peri was admitted.
translation.de: Laut Pflegepersonal kam Mr. Monroe allein, wegen seiner Kopfverletzung. Es ging um Peri.

translation.en: Where's her file? Where's her file?
Can we take this to my office, please?
translation.de: -Besprechen wir das in meinem Büro? -Es muss Aufzeichnungen geben.

translation.en: Gotta be a record somewhere, right? For patients admitted.
translation.de: -Besprechen wir das in meinem Büro? -Es muss Aufzeichnungen geben. Für Patienten.

translation.en: I wasn't on call then.
Sometimes files get misplaced
translation.de: Manchmal werden sie verlegt oder unter falschem Namen abgelegt.

translation.en: or they get filed under the wrong name. Maybe it wasn't entered into the system.
translation.de: Manchmal werden sie verlegt oder unter falschem Namen abgelegt. Wurde sie nicht eingegeben?

translation.en: These things happen.
You're full of shit.
You should call that Dr. Berthram, all right?
He sent Peri to get the CAT scan, and that was the last time I saw him.
translation.de: Er schickte Peri zum CT. Da sah ich ihn zuletzt.

translation.en: Call... Dr. Berthram.
This is ridiculous.
Where's Dr. Berthram?
He went off call. He's probably at home.
translation.de: Sein Dienst ist zu Ende. Er ist zu Hause.

translation.en: Well, if he can sort this out, it's probably worth giving him a call, right?
translation.de: Wenn er das klären kann, sollte man ihn anrufen.

translation.en: Right?
[Lucado] Call Gabe. [officer 1] Where do you do the CAT scans?
translation.de: -Rufen Sie Gabe an. -Wo werden CTs gemacht?

translation.en: Um... our imaging lab's on the third floor.
[officer 1] Okay. Take us up there please.
translation.de: Ok. Bringen Sie mich bitte hin.

translation.en: Take them up to three. [Ray] Hang on.
The CAT scans are downstairs.
-No, our imaging lab's on the third floor. -[Ray] No, no, no.
No, I saw them get in an elevator and go down.
translation.de: Nein, ich sah sie in den Aufzug steigen und nach unten fahren.

translation.en: He's obviously confused. Our lab is on three.
translation.de: Er ist verwirrt. Die Computertomographie ist oben.

translation.en: Can you take us up there, please?
[Lucado] This computer keeps a log of usage.
There's date, time, and duration.
translation.de: Hier sind Datum, Zeit und Dauer.

translation.en: You can see this machine was used at 9:07 a.m.
translation.de: Wie Sie sehen, wurde das Gerät um 9:07 Uhr benutzt,

translation.en: for a duration lasting exactly 29 minutes.
translation.de: für eine Dauer von genau 29 Minuten.

translation.en: And that was the last time.
Can you see this clearly, Mr. Monroe?
Yeah, it doesn't prove anything.
It proves no one had a scan at the time you say your daughter was here.
translation.de: Doch, dass niemand ein CT bekam, als Ihre Tochter angeblich hier war.

translation.en: -[officer 1] Makes sense. -[Lucado] Excuse me.
You can see this, right?
Yeah, she wasn't here, because they never brought her here. She didn't have a CAT scan. They just took her somewhere else.
translation.de: Sie brachten sie nie her. Sie bekam kein CT. Sie brachten sie weg.

translation.en: Where?
[scoffs] I don't know.
And why?
I don't know. You're the detective, you figure it out. I just know that there's something wrong with this place.
translation.de: Sie sind doch bei der Polizei. Ich weiß, dass hier etwas nicht stimmt.

translation.en: Dr. Berthram, who was attending this morning, will be here shortly.
translation.de: Dr. Berthram, der Oberarzt von morgens, ist in Kürze hier.

translation.en: Good. Maybe he can clear all this up.
translation.de: Gut. Vielleicht kann er das aufklären.

translation.en: Oh, I certainly hope so.
-[Anne] And there you go. -Thanks.
-What's your name, baby? -Anne.
Hmm. So, Anne... double shifts?
Single gal's gotta make a living.
translation.de: Eine alleinstehende Frau muss Geld verdienen.

translation.en: [officer 2] You ever sleep? What time you get off tonight?
translation.de: Schläfst du auch? Wann bist du fertig?

translation.en: [officer 1] Okay, well, this is him. Ray Monroe.
translation.de: Ok, das ist er. Ray Monroe.

translation.en: Found this in the trash out front. It's the morning sign-in list.
translation.de: Ich fand die Anmeldeliste von heute Morgen im Müll.

translation.en: [sighs] Here's my name. There's my name.
Ray, it's... it's your name.
-I signed in for Peri. -No, you signed in for yourself.
What's going on, Aaron?
Anne said something about missing patients.
translation.de: Anne sagte etwas von fehlenden Patienten.

translation.en: -You know me, right? Remember? -All right, back off.
All right? You saw my little girl, all right?
You-- You treated her arm. You-- You--
translation.de: Sie behandelten ihren Arm. Wissen Sie noch?

translation.en: -[officer 1] Do you remember this man? -[Ray] Tell 'em!
Tell them, please!
I do. He was here earlier today.
-Yes! Yes! -[officer 1] All right.
And what were the circumstances?
[Lucado] We have been all through this-- I'm talking to Dr. Berthram.
-What were the circumstances? -Uh...
He was, um...
He was a walk-in, and one of our doctors, Bruce Volk,
translation.de: Er war ein Notfall, und einer unserer Ärzte, Bruce Volk,

translation.en: um, he examined him.
He told Anne that he had been in a car accident.
translation.de: Er erzählte Anne, dass er einen Autounfall hatte.

translation.en: [Berthram] His behavior seemed rather... erratic.
Dr. Volk asked me to take a look.
translation.de: Dr. Volk bat mich um meine Meinung.

translation.en: So I suggested maybe doing a head CT, which he refused.
translation.de: Ich schlug vor, ein Kopf-CT zu machen, was er aber ablehnte.

translation.en: He insisted on going back out to the lobby to wait for his wife.
translation.de: Er bestand darauf, auf seine Frau warten zu wollen.

translation.en: -Wh-- What was her name? -[Anne] Abby.
Abby was her name.
Thought you said your wife's name was Joanne.
translation.de: Sie sagten, Ihre Frau heiße Joanne.

translation.en: -It is. -[officer 2] Then who's Abby?
translation.de: Ja, so ist es. Wer ist dann Abby?

translation.en: She's my first wife.
Where's Abby now?
[sniffles] She's dead.
She died.
She had nothing to do with Joanne and Peri.
translation.de: Sie hatte nichts mit Joanne und Peri zu tun.

translation.en: Joanne and Peri?
Who he claims is his current wife and child.
translation.de: Angeblich seine jetzige Frau und sein Kind.

translation.en: This is real.
This is Joanne, and this is Peri.
translation.de: Das ist Joanne, und das ist Peri.

translation.en: Periwinkle. You remember? Because that's Joanne's favorite shell.
translation.de: Periwinkle. Erinnern Sie sich? Auf Englisch eine Strandschnecke.

translation.en: And that's my family, and I love them.
[officer 1] What does your first wife have to do
translation.de: Was hat Ihre erste Frau mit allem zu tun?

translation.en: -with any of this? -[Ray] Nothin'.
translation.de: Was hat Ihre erste Frau mit allem zu tun? Nichts.

translation.en: You got Abby's name from the insurance information, right?
translation.de: Sie haben Abbys Namen aus den Versicherungsunterlagen.

translation.en: And you're just using it against me to make me look crazy,
translation.de: Sie benutzen sie, damit ich irre wirke,

translation.en: when, in reality,
you've kidnapped my family, and you've done something to 'em.
[Jeff] All right, enough. Enough.
Okay, there's a simple enough way to confirm or deny
any of this guy's bullshit.
Right there.
This is today's waiting room feed.
What time did you say you came in with your family?
translation.de: Wann kamen Sie mit Ihrer Familie?

translation.en: [Ray] Late morning.
So, we'll start at 9:00 a.m. Work our way forward from there until we see you.
translation.de: Dann beginnen wir ab 9 Uhr und arbeiten uns durch, bis wir Sie sehen.

translation.en: [Ray] Stop. Stop.
-Go back. -[player whirs]
Okay, this is me coming in, and Joanne was carrying Peri behind me.
translation.de: Da komme ich rein. Joanne trug Peri, hinter mir.

translation.en: All right, there I am. Right.
This is where she said wait. Um, I went back to the seating area.
translation.de: Da sagte sie "warten Sie". Ich ging wieder in den Warteraum.

translation.en: [officer 1] What are those? Those little glitches? [Jeff] It's an older system.
translation.de: -Was sind das für Störungen? -Das System ist alt.

translation.en: Records 30 seconds out of every minute, so there's gonna be gaps.
translation.de: Pro Minute nimmt es 30 Sekunden auf. Es gibt Lücken.

translation.en: That's pretty convenient.
-[officer 1] Well, where's your family? -[Ray] They're right there. Just--
translation.de: Wo ist Ihre Familie? Sie sind da.

translation.en: Can you-- They're under the camera.
You can't see where they're sitting 'cause of the chairs. You got a better angle?
translation.de: Ihre Stühle sind nicht zu sehen. Gibt es einen besseren Winkel?

translation.en: The ones you see are the ones that are workin' out there.
-Just fast forward, fast forward. -[player whirs]
[Ray] Stop.
All right, there I am coming back. That's after Peri went for the CAT scan.
translation.de: Da komme ich zurück, nachdem Peri zum CT ging.

translation.en: [Jeff] Yeah. Never saw you go in with 'em, though.
translation.de: Ja. Aber ich sah Sie nie mit ihnen reingehen.

translation.en: Your security system is shit.
You've got nothing of my family going in.
translation.de: Man sieht nichts von meiner Familie.

translation.en: -Excuse me. -[Ray] This is just shit!
Do you have any footage from inside the ER?
translation.de: Gibt es Aufnahmen innerhalb der Notaufnahme?

translation.en: [Lucado] We don't record in the treatment areas. Uh, legal reasons, patient privacy.
translation.de: Da zeichnen wir nichts auf. Datenschutz, Privatsphäre.

translation.en: [Berthram] Is Dr. Jacobs on call? Check the hallways. Check the hallways. Check 'em, all right?
translation.de: -Hat Dr. Jacobs Dienst? -Schauen Sie in den Gängen nach.

translation.en: You have better camera placement in the hall. We're gonna be here all fuckin' night.
translation.de: -Da sind die Kameras besser platziert. -Es wird spät.

translation.en: -[Ray] Search the hospital! -[officer 1] Okay, that's not happening.
First, we would need a warrant. Then we would need probable cause,
translation.de: Wir bräuchten eine Anordnung und Verdacht,

translation.en: and there's nothing on that video that proves anyone is even missing.
translation.de: es gibt keinen Beweis dafür, dass jemand fehlt.

translation.en: You think that I'm faking? You think I'm making them up?
translation.de: Meinen Sie, ich denke mir das Ganze aus?

translation.en: I showed you the picture!
That could be anybody.
Your sister, niece.
I mean, the person you keep talking about is Abby.
translation.de: Sie reden nur ständig von dieser Abby.

translation.en: I don't keep talking about Abby. You keep talking about Abby.
translation.de: Ich rede nicht ständig von Abby. Das tun nur Sie.

translation.en: Come on. Come on, Ray. You got this.
translation.de: Komm schon, Ray. Du schaffst das.

translation.en: The cashier at the service station where Peri fell,
translation.de: Die Kassiererin an der Tankstelle, wo Peri stürzte,

translation.en: she saw us together.
There's a Gas and Go, it's a couple of miles from here. Ask her.
translation.de: Da ist eine Tankstelle unweit von hier. Fragen Sie sie.

translation.en: -Ask her. -Uh-huh.
-I'll see if I can track her down. -[Ray] Thank you.
translation.de: Mal sehen, ob ich sie finde.

translation.en: Okay.
-[sighs] -[Berthram] Mr. Monroe,
I think we found someone back in the ward that can help us clear everything up.
translation.de: ich glaube, wir haben jemanden, der uns helfen kann, alles zu klären.

translation.en: Let's go.
Let's go, then.
Call if you need backup.
translation.de: Ich bin hier, falls etwas ist.

translation.en: It's Peri's.
This is Peri's scarf.
Jo gave it to me. It must've dropped out when we were here this morning.
translation.de: Jo gab ihn mir. Sie ließ ihn wohl heute Morgen fallen.

translation.en: Can you prove it in some way?
-I mean, is her name on the tag? -It's hers!
-[officer 1] Is there a receipt? -It's hers.
[officer 1] Can I see it, please?
Yes. Just, gentle...
Gentle.
Is this her blood too?
It's... It's my blood.
It's my blood from my head when we fell into the pit.
translation.de: Mein Kopf blutete, als wir in die Grube fielen.

translation.en: You know that.
[Berthram] Look, with a head injury....
it's not uncommon to be confused or to mix things up,
translation.de: kann man durchaus verwirrt sein oder Dinge verwechseln.

translation.en: and you're obviously confused. No, no, no.
Why would I have my daughter's scarf and not her?
translation.de: Warum sollte der Schal hier sein, aber nicht meine Tochter?

translation.en: And this is her scarf 'cause she had it in the car when we were coming back from Thanksgiving,
translation.de: Es ist ihr Schal, sie hatte ihn im Auto, als wir von Thanksgiving zurückfuhren.

translation.en: and she wanted some batteries, so we stopped in a service station. She fell, she went in the hole, and I fell in on top of her,
translation.de: Sie wollte Batterien, deshalb hielten wir. Sie fiel in ein Loch, ich auf sie drauf.

translation.en: and that's where she got the blood.
And then we came here because she had a broken arm, and she--
translation.de: Sie brach sich den Arm, deshalb kamen wir...

translation.en: We saw you and--
Stop! Get your shit together, man, or you going to jail!
translation.de: Aufhören! Reißen Sie sich zusammen, sonst landen Sie im Knast!

translation.en: Do you understand?
You understand? Get it together.
[woman] Hello, Ray.
I'm Dr. Teresa Jacobs.
I work in the psychiatric department for the county.
translation.de: Ich bin im Bezirk psychiatrisch tätig.

translation.en: You're a shrink?
I prefer "medical counselor," but... "shrink," sure.
translation.de: "Ärztliche Beratung" ist mir lieber, aber... "Seelenklempnerin", ja.

translation.en: [sighs] I am not crazy.
No one is saying that you are.
I'd like to help you find out what happened to Joanne and Peri.
translation.de: Ich möchte Ihnen helfen, zu klären, was mit Joanne und Peri geschah.

translation.en: We're as concerned about them as you are.
translation.de: Wir sind genauso besorgt wie Sie.

translation.en: -I doubt that. -You should think about listening, man.
translation.de: Das bezweifle ich. Sie sollten auf jemanden hören.

translation.en: Officer, thank you. I can handle this now.
translation.de: Vielen Dank. Ich komme gut klar.

translation.en: You want to come somewhere more private and talk about this?
translation.de: Sollen wir das im privateren Rahmen besprechen?

translation.en: Yeah.
Good.
Come on, then.
So, I thought you might be happy to know
they found your admissions file.
Yeah.
Oh, finally.
It's, um, your file, Ray, not your daughter's.
translation.de: Es ist Ihre Akte, Ray, nicht die Ihrer Tochter.

translation.en: There's no mention of Peri in here.
[sniffles] No, it's just bullshit that they just made up.
translation.de: Nein, das ist der Schwachsinn, den die erfunden haben.

translation.en: I was hoping you could talk a bit about what happened
translation.de: Erzählen Sie mir doch etwas darüber,

translation.en: before the car accident.
[sniffles] It wasn't a car accident.
She fell at a construction site.
translation.de: Sie stürzte auf einer Baustelle ab.

translation.en: Okay, sorry, I only know what's in here. Maybe you could tell me what you remember.
translation.de: Ich weiß nur das, was hier steht. Woran erinnern Sie sich noch?

translation.en: I remember everything. Don't treat me like I'm crazy.
translation.de: An alles. Tun Sie nicht, als sei ich verrückt.

translation.en: [Jacobs] I am treating you as a rational human being, Ray.
translation.de: Ich behandele Sie wie einen vernünftigen Menschen.

translation.en: Right now, all I've got to go on is your word that they were here at all.
translation.de: Ich habe nur Ihr Wort, dass sie überhaupt hier waren.

translation.en: There's this.
This proves that they were here...
translation.de: Er beweist, dass sie hier waren

translation.en: and that they are hiding them.
He's just hiding everything--
Hiding... what?
That your wife and little girl came in at random for treatment? Why would we do that?
translation.de: Dass Ihre Frau und Tochter hier waren? Warum sollten wir das tun?

translation.en: Oh, you work here, you tell me.
Tell me about Abby.
She was your first wife? It's not got anything to do with Abby.
translation.de: -Sie war Ihre erste Frau? -Das hat überhaupt nichts mit Abby zu tun.

translation.en: -And she died? -[Ray] Yeah.
Eight years ago.
Why don't you tell me what happened?
[Ray sighs] It was an accident.
[stammers] She-- It was a head-on collision.
Car accident?
[Ray] Yeah.
This has nothing to do with this... or my family now.
translation.de: Das hat nichts damit oder meiner Familie jetzt zu tun.

translation.en: In the file, you mentioned a drinking problem.
translation.de: Laut der Akte erwähnten Sie ein Alkoholproblem.

translation.en: That day, Ray,
had you been drinking?
-[Abby] Ray! Ray! [screams] -[glass shatters]
[Jacobs] When the accident happened, Ray,
translation.de: Waren Sie, als der Unfall geschah,

translation.en: were you too drunk to help Abby?
translation.de: zu betrunken, um Abby zu helfen?

translation.en: [Ray] You didn't even see.
You didn't see it.
Nothing could help her.
translation.de: Man konnte ihr nicht mehr helfen.

translation.en: I couldn't.
Have you ever had blackouts, Ray?
-Moments of missing time? -Oh, God. I don't drink. I don't drink anymore.
translation.de: -Fehlten Ihnen Zeitabschnitte? -Ich trinke nicht. Ich trinke nicht mehr.

translation.en: -I haven't had a drink in eight years. -[Jacobs] Why...
translation.de: Seit acht Jahren rühre ich nichts an.

translation.en: did you tell the staff that you were waiting for Abby, Ray?
translation.de: Warum sagten Sie den Mitarbeitern, dass Sie auf Abby warten, Ray?

translation.en: Help me understand all this.
translation.de: Helfen Sie mir, alles zu verstehen.

translation.en: [sobbing] Abby died in a car accident eight years ago,
translation.de: Abby starb vor acht Jahren bei einem Autounfall,

translation.en: and it kills me.
Every day. It just...
-[sniffles, takes a deep breath] -All right.
I'm gonna say something,
and it's gonna be hard to hear.
But you have to listen, Ray,
because I believe you.
I believe something happened to Peri and Joanne...
translation.de: Ich glaube, Peri und Joanne ist etwas passiert...

translation.en: Which is why...
I think we should take a look at the spot
translation.de: sollten wir uns den Ort ansehen,

translation.en: where Peri had her accident.
translation.de: an dem Peri ihren Unfall hatte.

translation.en: Why? There's nothing there.
[Jacobs] I think it's a good idea, Ray.
translation.de: Ich halte es für eine gute Idee.

translation.en: If you'll excuse me for a moment, hmm?
[Jacobs] He's obviously experiencing some deep trauma.
translation.de: Er hat offensichtlich ein schweres Trauma.

translation.en: He's confused.
I suggest going back to the place he claims his daughter was hurt.
translation.de: Ich schlage vor, dahin zu gehen, wo seine Tochter verletzt wurde.

translation.en: What are you thinking?
They might still be out there.
[Berthram] Oh, God.
I'll, uh, put a call into the canine unit and see if they can meet us
translation.de: Ich rufe die Hundestaffel. Vielleicht kann sie zur Tankstelle kommen.

translation.en: -at the gas station. -[Jacobs] Mm-hmm.
translation.de: Vielleicht kann sie zur Tankstelle kommen.

translation.en: The place is closed,
but I've got dispatch trying to track down the cashier.
translation.de: die Zentrale versucht, die Kassiererin zu finden.

translation.en: Um, it might be good for us if you come along.
translation.de: -Es wäre sicher gut, Sie kämen mit. -Natürlich.

translation.en: -Of course. -[Ray] They're not out there.
translation.de: -Es wäre sicher gut, Sie kämen mit. -Natürlich. Sie sind nicht da.

translation.en: Maybe you're all in on this, or maybe you're not.
translation.de: Vielleicht machen Sie alle gemeinsame Sache.

translation.en: The fact is, my wife and daughter went down a hallway in this hospital
translation.de: Meine Frau und Tochter waren in diesem Krankenhaus

translation.en: and never came back,
and that's what happened.
[officer 1] Is that it, up ahead?
Yeah.
[officer 1] Thanks for coming so quickly.
[officer 3] No problem. What have you got?
[officer 1] Two missing persons, a woman and child.
translation.de: Zwei Vermisste, eine Frau und ein Kind.

translation.en: [officer 3] You got an incident site?
Ray, where did your daughter fall?
[officer 3] Got a scent source for Mandy?
Can I see that scarf, Ray?
The only thing that dog's gonna smell is that we were here earlier.
translation.de: Der Hund riecht nur, dass wir heute hier waren.

translation.en: We have to start somewhere, Ray.
[officer 3] Mandy, find.
[officer 3] Good girl. Good girl.
-[Jacobs] What happened here, Ray? -Nothing.
Just, Peri lost a compact, you know? This tiny toy mirror,
translation.de: Peri verlor ihre Puderdose, mit dem kleinen Spiegel,

translation.en: and she was upset, so...
me and Jo, we looked for it.
She looked in the bathroom, I looked in the car, and then...
translation.de: Sie sah auf der Toilette nach, ich im Auto.

translation.en: and I lost sight of her for a second.
And I look up, and there's this dog growlin' at her,
translation.de: Ich sah hoch und sah, wie sie ein Hund anknurrte.

translation.en: and she spooked and fell.
translation.de: Sie erschrak sich und stürzte ab.

translation.en: It was nothing.
[officer 3] Here we go. I think she's got something.
translation.de: Hier. Ich glaube, sie hat etwas.

translation.en: We got something.
[Jacobs] Come on.
[Ray] Let me see it. Let me see it. Please.
Please. Just give that to me. It's Peri's. That's what Peri lost.
translation.de: Geben Sie her. Sie gehört Peri. Peri hat sie verloren.

translation.en: Please, that's Peri's compact.
Must have just been in her pocket the whole time,
translation.de: Sie war wohl in ihrer Tasche

translation.en: and it just fell out when she fell. [chuckles, sighs]
translation.de: und fiel raus, als sie stürzte.

translation.en: [officer 2] And the blood? That's your daughter's blood?
translation.de: Und das Blut? Ist es von Ihrer Tochter?

translation.en: It's my blood. I hit my head.
translation.de: Nein, ich schlug mir den Kopf an.

-Were you upset about something? -[breathing shakily]

[Ray] I was...
I had a fight with my wife about my marriage.

translation.en: I know that she just wants me to try harder. And I do try hard!

translation.en: I told Peri, "Just stay there." Right? "Just stay right there."

translation.de: Sie hörte nicht. Sie hätte hören müssen.

translation.en: So you were angry with her.
Yeah, I was angry. I picked up a rock, and I threw it.
At who?
[sobs] At-- [stammers] At the dog.
I tried hard.
I tried really hard to-- to-- to- to grab her.

translation.en: She still fell.
are you sure there was a dog?

translation.en: [Jacobs] There was no dog, was there, Ray?

translation.en: There was no accident.
Peri didn't fall.
-You made that all up. -[Ray mutters]
It happened!
It's-- That's all that happened.
[Jacobs] Think, Ray.
You were upset at your daughter,
translation.de: Sie waren sauer auf Ihre Tochter,

translation.en: angry at your wife,
angry at yourself.
So you picked up a rock.
[Jacobs] When it was over,
you were so angry at yourself at what you'd done...

[Jo] Ray!
[Jacobs] So you... lash out.
[Jo screams] No! No!

it can sometimes create an alternate reality, a false reality,

translation.en: to shield itself from trauma.

from the horrors we can't even imagine.

your mind couldn't accept the fact that it had happened all over again.

I would never hurt you, sweetie.

Ray?
